question: Question
walkthroughTitle2: Correct essays written in your native language!
walkthroughSubitle1: Improve your writing skills by writing essays on various topics such as daily events, future dreams and goals, work and lifestyle.
walkthroughSubitle2: Every time you correct someone else's essay once, your essay will be corrected once by a native speaker.
walkthroughSubitle3: You can ask native speakers as many questions as you have answered other learners' questions.
